Title: Understand GitHub Copilot Chat Window in Visual Studio Code | BinaryIntellect Knowledge Base
Description: In the previous article, we learned how to install GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio Code. In this article, we will learn how to use GitHub Copilot Chat in Visual Studio Code. We will first understand various parts of the GitHub Chat window and then we will ask a few ASP.NET Core questions to GitHub Copilot Chat.
